All Classes

Class Description
Apprun
Contains main method
Dataset
The class is used to save information and all instances of the input file
Edge
This Class represents an edge of a general graph.
EdgeCompare
This class implements Comparator to make possible the comparison of two object of type edge by their weight value Is used for sorting edge type elements
Graph
Abstract class.
InputParams
This Class makes the input parameters parsing and saves the arguments as attributes
Instance
Class represents an instance/row from a data set.
LLmodel
Calculates the weight of an edge using the log-likelihood score.
MDLmodel
Calculates the weight of an edge using the Minimum Description Length score.
Measure
Class for the assessment metrics of the classifier: accuracy, specificity, sensitivity and F1score
Node
Node definition - This class represents a node of a general graph but can also save other information more specific about TAN parameters
ReadCSV
ReadCSV class reads an CSV file and save it to a Dataset .
ReadFile
Performs a standardized way to get data from a file ReadFile interface provides a way to read a file which guarantees matching with all code structure already developed
ScoreModel
Abstract class.
TAN
Class with a TAN Bayes classifier.
Tree
This class represents a Tree data structure and is a sub-type of graph type
UndirFullGraph
This class represents a Undirected Fully connected graph which is a sub-type of graph data structure
